¶ Therefore thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; Because ye have not heard<WH8085> my words<WH1697>,

¶ Howl<WH3213>, ye shepherds<WH7462>, and cry<WH2199>; and wallow<WH6428> yourselves in the ashes, ye principal<WH117> of the flock<WH6629>: for the days<WH3117> of your slaughter<WH2873> and of your dispersions<WH8600> are accomplished<WH4390>; and ye shall fall<WH5307> like a pleasant<WH2532> vessel<WH3627>.
